title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 139 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 139 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O LORD, thou hast searched me, and known me.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长）耶和华阿，你已经鉴察我，认识我。

lineList.en: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off.
lineList.cn: 我坐下，我起来，你都晓得。你从远处知道我的意念。

lineList.en: Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.
lineList.cn: 我行路，我躺卧，你都细察，你也深知我一切所行的。

lineList.en: For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O LORD, thou knowest it altogether.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我舌头上的话，你腔有一句不知道的。

lineList.en: Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.
lineList.cn: 你在我前后环绕我，按手在我身上。

lineList.en: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.
lineList.cn: 这样的知识奇妙，是我不能测的。至高，是我不能及的。

lineList.en: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?
lineList.cn: 我往那里去躲避你的灵。我往那里逃躲避你的面。

lineList.en: If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.
lineList.cn: 我若升到天上，你在那里。我若在阴间下榻，你也在那里。

lineList.en: If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea;
lineList.cn: 我若展开清晨的翅膀，飞到海极居住。

lineList.en: Even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.
lineList.cn: 就是在那里，你的手必引导我，你的右手，也必扶持我。

lineList.en: If I say, Surely the darkness shall cover me; even the night shall be light about me.
lineList.cn: 我若说，黑夜必定遮蔽我，我周围的亮光必成为黑夜。

lineList.en: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.
lineList.cn: 黑暗也不能遮蔽我使你不见，黑夜却如白昼发亮。黑暗和光明，在你看都是一样。

lineList.en: For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother's womb.
lineList.cn: 我的肺腑是你所造的。我在母腹中，你已覆庇我。

lineList.en: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
lineList.cn: 我要称谢你，因我受造，奇妙可畏。你的作为奇妙，这是我心深知道的。

lineList.en: My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
lineList.cn: 我在暗中受造，在地的深处被联络。那时，我的形体并不向你隐藏。

lineList.en: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
lineList.cn: 我未成形的体质，你的眼早已看见了。你所定的日子，我尚未度一日（或作我被造的肢体尚未有其一），你都写在你的册上了。

lineList.en: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them!
lineList.cn: 神阿，你的意念向我何等宝贵。其数何等众多。

lineList.en: If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
lineList.cn: 我若数点，比海沙更多。我睡醒的时候，仍和你同在。

lineList.en: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你必要杀戮恶人。所以，你们好流人血的，离开我去吧。

lineList.en: For they speak against thee wickedly, and thine enemies take thy name in vain.
lineList.cn: 因为他们说恶言顶撞你。你的仇敌也妄称你的名。

lineList.en: Do not I hate them, O LORD, that hate thee? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，恨恶你的，我岂不恨恶他们吗。攻击你的，我岂不憎嫌他们吗。

lineList.en: I hate them with perfect hatred: I count them mine enemies.
lineList.cn: 我切切地恨恶他们，以他们为仇敌。

lineList.en: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts:
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你鉴察我，知道我的心思，试炼我，知道我的意念。

lineList.en: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
lineList.cn: 看在我里面有什么恶行没有，引导我走永生的道路。
